text:
On this glorious day, YOU get to help decide
how the universe will work!

(or at least, the small but awesome part of
it called the United States of America)
All you need to do is go and vote!

And guess what - the internet has even made
it easy for you!

If you go to this website and type in your
address, google will not only tell you where

your polling place is, but also who's on your
local ballot.

So as Hank Green of Vlogbrothers so eloquently
put it: don't forget to vote, America!
